column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My daughter and I had a total blast today we were able to take part of the Thursday free admission for Illinois residents all you need to do is to line up going side give them your zip code and you are a giving free admission tickets which we got my daughter and I we stay at approximately about two and a half hours this place is massive is split between early and Modern Art you have your sculptures you have your paintings you have artifacts from different stages are us in American Indian Asian African culture definitely was enjoyable
